view.animations.unit

Class AbstractEntityView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.animations.unit.AbstractAnimationView
      • view.animations.unit.AbstractEntityView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnimationView, EntityAnimationView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractEnemyView, HeroViewImpl

    public abstract class AbstractEntityView
extends AbstractAnimationView
implements EntityAnimationView
    An implementation of EntityAnimationView. It manages the animations of an Entity that can move in the game. It calculates the frame to display based on the entity's status. The animation of an entity is updated periodically, at the specified frequency.
